#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,m,ans=1;
	m = t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,i;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		int a[n];
		long int sum=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%d",&a[i]);
		sort(a,a+n);
		sum = a[n-3]+a[n-2]+a[n-1];
		printf("Case %d: %ld\n",ans,sum);
		if(ans<=m)
		ans++;
	}
	return 0;
}
